title: Raman microspectroscopy and laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy for the analysis of polyethylene microplastics in human soft tissues
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Viktória Parobková, Daniel Holub, Martin Kizovský, Gabriela Kalčíková, Ula Rozman, Milan Urík, Karel Novotný, Ota Samek, Tomáš Zikmund, Pavel Pořízka, Jozef Kaiser
